message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $125 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $115 for it.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $122.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, Alice. However, $122.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $112 for it.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I can offer it to you for $120, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I understand that you've compromised a lot, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $100 for it, and that's my final offer.
